tool_description: Flight data API for travel, hospitality, or aviation applications, researchers, small teams, and individual developers.
name: AeroDataBox
title: AeroDataBox

api_list.name: (BETA) Weather / forecast at the airport - specific time
api_list.description: - What is the weather forecast for the airport? (up to 48 hours ahead)

required_parameters.name: code
codeType
required_parameters.description: Type of code to search airport by (`iata` or `icao`)

optional_parameters.name: toLocal
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) End of the search range (local time, format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm`). Must be equal to or more than the beginning of the search range specified in `fromLocal`, up to 48 hours in the future. Default equal to `fromLocal`.

optional_parameters.name: fromLocal
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Beginning of the search range (local time, format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm`). Must be in range from current time up to 48 hours in the future. Default - current time.

api_list.name: (BETA) Weather / forecast at the airport - current
api_list.description: - What is the current weather at the airport?

required_parameters.name: code
codeType
required_parameters.description: Type of code to search airport by (`iata` or `icao`)

api_list.name: (NEW) FIDS/Schedules: Airport departures and arrivals (by relative time)
api_list.description:
**What are current departures or arrivals at the airport?** or **What is the flight schedule at the airport?** or **What is flight history at the airport?**

Flights may contain live updates with corresponding information related to the actual progress of the flight (including actual/estimated arrival/departure times). In this case this endpoint serves as a FIDS endpoint. Presense of live updates is subject to data coverage: not all airports have this coverage in our system.

Otherwise the flight information will be limited to schedule only and will not be updated with time. Much more airports have this coverage.

To check if airport is tracked and on which level, use `/health/services/airports/{icao}/feeds` endpoint. You can also use `/health/services/feeds/{service}/airports` to get the list of supported airports for this or that layer of coverage.

To learn more about the data coverage, refer to https://www.aerodatabox.com/data-coverage.

Returns: the list of arriving and/or departing flights scheduled and/or planned and/or commenced within a time range specified 
relatively to the current local time at the airport.

required_parameters.name: codeType
required_parameters.description: Type of code to search airport by (`iata` or `icao`)

required_parameters.name: code

optional_parameters.name: withCancelled
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, result will include cancelled, divered, likely cancelled (CanceledUncertain) flights. Default: true.

optional_parameters.name: withLocation
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, each currently active flight within the result will be populated with its present real-time location, altitude, speed and track (subject to availability).

optional_parameters.name: withCargo
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, result will include cargo flights (subject to availability).

optional_parameters.name: durationMinutes
optional_parameters.description: Length (duration) of the search range expressed in minutes

optional_parameters.name: offsetMinutes
optional_parameters.description: Beginning of the search range expressed in minutes relative to the current time at the airport

optional_parameters.name: direction
optional_parameters.description: Direction of flights: Arrival, Departure or Both (default)

optional_parameters.name: withCodeshared
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, result will include flights with all code-shared statuses. Otherwise, code-sharing flights will be excluded. For airports, where no information about code-share statuses of flights are supplied (all flights are CodeshareStatus=Unknown), complex filtering will be applied to determine which flights are likely to be operational (caution: false results are possible).

optional_parameters.name: withLeg
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, will include movement information from airport opposite in this flight leg (airport of origin for arriving flight or airport of destination for departing flight). In this case, Movement property will be replaced with Departure and Arrival properties for each flight. Default: false.

optional_parameters.name: withPrivate
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, result will include private flights (subject to availability).

api_list.name: FIDS/Schedules: Airport departures and arrivals (by local time range)
api_list.description:
**What are current departures or arrivals at the airport?** or **What is the flight schedule at the airport?** or **What is flight history at the airport?**

Flights may contain live updates with corresponding information related to the actual progress of the flight (including actual/estimated arrival/departure times). In this case this endpoint serves as a FIDS endpoint. Presense of live updates is subject to data coverage: not all airports have this coverage in our system.

Otherwise the flight information will be limited to schedule only and will not be updated with time. Much more airports have this coverage.

To check if airport is tracked and on which level, use `/health/services/airports/{icao}/feeds` endpoint. You can also use `/health/services/feeds/{service}/airports` to get the list of supported airports for this or that layer of coverage.

To learn more about the data coverage, refer to https://www.aerodatabox.com/data-coverage.

Returns: the list of arriving and/or departing flights scheduled and/or planned and/or commenced within a specified time range for a specified airport.

required_parameters.name: toLocal
required_parameters.description: End of the search range (local time, format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm). Should be more than beginning of the search range, but not more than by 12 hours.

required_parameters.name: code
codeType
required_parameters.description: Type of code to search airport by (`iata` or `icao`)

required_parameters.name: fromLocal
required_parameters.description: Beginning of the search range (local time, format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm)

optional_parameters.name: withCargo
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, result will include cargo flights (subject to availability).

optional_parameters.name: withPrivate
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, result will include private flights (subject to availability).

optional_parameters.name: direction
optional_parameters.description: Direction of flights: Arrival, Departure or Both (default)

optional_parameters.name: withCancelled
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, result will include cancelled, divered, likely cancelled (CanceledUncertain) flights. Default: true.

optional_parameters.name: withLocation
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, each currently active flight within the result will be populated with its present real-time location, altitude, speed and track (subject to availability).

optional_parameters.name: withCodeshared
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, result will include flights with all code-shared statuses. Otherwise, code-sharing flights will be excluded. For airports, where no information about code-share statuses of flights are supplied (all flights are CodeshareStatus=Unknown), complex filtering will be applied to determine which flights are likely to be operational (caution: false results are possible).

optional_parameters.name: withLeg
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, will include movement information from airport opposite in this flight leg (airport of origin for arriving flight or airport of destination for departing flight). In this case, Movement property will be replaced with Departure and Arrival properties for each flight. Default: false.

api_list.name: Current local time at the airport
api_list.description: What is the current local time at the airport?

required_parameters.name: code
codeType
required_parameters.description: Type of code to search airport by (iata or icao)

api_list.name: Flight delay statistics by flight number
api_list.description:
**By how much the flight is delayed in average?** 

Gets delay statistics for the flight with specified number.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: Flight number (with or without spaces, IATA or ICAO, any case formats are acceptable, e.g. KL1395, Klm 1395)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com/flights/KL1395/delays"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com/flights/{number}/delays"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: (BETA) Airport routes and daily flights statistics (by date)
api_list.description:
**What are the most popular routes from an airport?** or **Where I can fly from an airport?** or **How many daily flights to different destinations from an airport?**

Gets list of routes and daily flights amount departing from an airport based on 7 days prior to selected date.

required_parameters.name: code
codeType
required_parameters.description: Type of code to search airport by (`iata` or `icao`)

api_list.name: Global delays (by date)
api_list.description:
**What is the historical delay situation in all airports?** or **What was the delay index of all airports at a moment in the past?**

*Returns:* Statistical delay information about delays (median delay, delay index, cancelled flights) of arrivals and departures for all known airports, represented by a collection of items sorted in departure index descending order (from worst to best).

required_parameters.name: dateTimeUtc
required_parameters.description: The moment of time for / from which delay data is requested (UTC time, format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm). Default - current time.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com/airports/delays/2022-01-21T12:00"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com/airports/delays/{datetimeutc}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Airport routes and daily flights statistics (current)
api_list.description:
**What are the most popular routes from an airport?** or **Where I can fly from an airport?** or **How many daily flights to different destinations from an airport?**

Gets list of routes and daily flights amount departing from an airport based on 7 days prior to current local date.

required_parameters.name: codeType
required_parameters.description: Type of code to search airport by (`iata` or `icao`)

required_parameters.name: code

api_list.name: Airport delays (by date)
api_list.description:
**What is the delay index at a moment in the past?""

Statistics are calculated against the flight data we aggregated. Henceforth, it is available only for those airports and those periods of time when delay information could have been reasonably derived. This applies to flights which qualify for this calculation (actual time and status of the flight must be available). This normally applies to flights arriving to / departing from the airports with Live or Radar + Scheduled quality. Learn more about coverage here: https://aerodatabox.com/data-coverage/

Median delay and delay index are available if there were at least 2 flights per hour per departures or arrivals at the time requested and at least 3 total qualifying flights within the coverage period.

*Returns*: Statistical delay information about delays (median delay, delay index, cancelled flights) of arrivals and departures for the requested airport, represented by a single `AirportDelayContract` item displaying the delay information based on flight movements within the 2 hours prior to the moment requested in `dateLocal`

required_parameters.name: code
codeType
required_parameters.description: Type of code to search airport by (`iata` or `icao`)

api_list.name: Airport delays (current)
api_list.description:
**What is the current average delay in the airport?*

Statistics are calculated against the flight data we aggregated. Henceforth, it is available only for those airports and those periods of time when delay information could have been reasonably derived. This applies to flights which qualify for this calculation (actual time and status of the flight must be available). This normally applies to flights arriving to / departing from the airports with Live or Radar + Scheduled quality. Learn more about coverage here: https://aerodatabox.com/data-coverage/

Median delay and delay index are available if there were at least 2 flights per hour per departures or arrivals at the time requested and at least 3 total qualifying flights within the coverage period.

*Returns*: Statistical delay information about delays (median delay, delay index, cancelled flights) of arrivals and departures for the requested airport, represented by a single `AirportDelayContract` item displaying the delay information based on flight movements within the 2 hours prior to the current moment, if no `dateLocal` is specified.

required_parameters.name: codeType
required_parameters.description: Type of code to search airport by (`iata` or `icao`)

required_parameters.name: code

api_list.name: Global delays (current)
api_list.description:
**What is the current delay situation in all airports?** or **What is the delay index of all airports right now ?**

*Returns:* Statistical delay information about delays (median delay, delay index, cancelled flights) of arrivals and departures for all known airports, represented by a collection of items sorted in departure index descending order (from worst to best).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com/airports/delays"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com/airports/delays"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Airport delays (by range of dates)
api_list.description:
**What is the historical average delay in the airport?** or **How the delays changed within a specific period of time?**

Statistics are calculated against the flight data we aggregated. Henceforth, it is available only for those airports and those periods of time when delay information could have been reasonably derived. This applies to flights which qualify for this calculation (actual time and status of the flight must be available). This normally applies to flights arriving to / departing from the airports with Live or Radar + Scheduled quality. Learn more about coverage here: https://aerodatabox.com/data-coverage/

Median delay and delay index are available if there were at least 2 flights per hour per departures or arrivals at the time requested and at least 3 total qualifying flights within the coverage period.

*Returns*: Statistical delay information about delays (median delay, delay index, cancelled flights) of arrivals and departures for the requested airport, represented by a collection of `AiportDelayContract` items displaying the delay information at multiple moments within the period between `dateLocal` and `dateToLocal`, if both are specified.

required_parameters.name: codeType
required_parameters.description: Type of code to search airport by (`iata` or `icao`)

required_parameters.name: dateLocal
required_parameters.description: The moment of time for / from which delay data is requested (local time, format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm).

required_parameters.name: dateToLocal
required_parameters.description: The moment of time until which delay data is requested (local time, format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm).

required_parameters.name: code

api_list.name: Flight status (by date)
api_list.description:
Gets information about the status of the nearest (either in past or in future) flight or about flight departing or arriving on the day specified (local time), operated:
- under specified flight number; or
- by an aircraft with specified registration; or
- under specified ATC-callsign; or
- by an aircraft with specified Mode-S 24-bit ICAO Transponder address.

required_parameters.name: dateLocal
required_parameters.description: Optional parameter: Local date of departure or arrival (in format: YYYY-MM-DD, e.g.: 2019-08-29). If specified, endpoint gets information about flight departing or arriving on the day specified (local time).

required_parameters.name: searchBy
searchParameter

optional_parameters.name: withLocation
optional_parameters.description: Should include real-time positional data, e.g.: location, speed, altitude, etc., if available

optional_parameters.name: withAircraftImage
optional_parameters.description: Should include aircraft image.

api_list.name: (BETA) Airline fleet / Aircraft list by airline code
api_list.description:
*Returns: * A paged list of aircraft in the fleet of the specified airline.

That will include active aircraft currently flying in an active airline, verfified through more than one source. Unconfirmed sightings of an aircraft will not qualify said aircraft to be listed in the fleet.

required_parameters.name: airlineCode
required_parameters.description:
3-character ICAO-code of the airliner (e.g., KLM, ACA); or 2-character IATA-code of the airline (e.g., KL, AC).

Please note that more than one active airline may have the same IATA code, therefore IATA codes are not recommended for this endpoint.

required_parameters.name: pageSize
required_parameters.description: The number of returned records will be capped at this value. Must be a positive value and not exceed the limit stipulated by your pricing plan.

optional_parameters.name: pageOffset
optional_parameters.description: The number of records to skip before listing a page of records. In conjunction with `pageSize` effectively determines the page number (default  - 0).

optional_parameters.name: withRegistrations
optional_parameters.description: Should include the history of aircraft registrations (default: false).

api_list.name: Aircraft registration history (by tail-number, Mode-S or ID)
api_list.description: Returns: A list of all known registrations of a single aircraft, best matching specified search criteria, if found

required_parameters.name: searchParam
searchBy
required_parameters.description: Criteria to search aircraft by

api_list.name: Get all aircraft (by tail-number, Mode-S or ID)
api_list.description: Returns: A list of all aircraft matching the search criteria

required_parameters.name: searchParam
searchBy
required_parameters.description: Criteria to search aircraft by

optional_parameters.name: withRegistrations
optional_parameters.description: Should include the history of aircraft registrations (default: false).

optional_parameters.name: withImage
optional_parameters.description: Should include aircraft image (default: false).

api_list.name: (BETA) Aircraft image by registration
api_list.description:
**What is the aircraft photo?  **

Aircraft images are being searched externally in Flickr. Only images with licenses approved for commercial use are returned. Please be advised that you may be required to mention author attribution before using the image.  

Returns: Image data with medium-sized direct image URL and licence approved for commercial use is returned.

required_parameters.name: reg
required_parameters.description: Registration of the aircraft (full, stripped and any case formats are acceptable).

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com/aircrafts/reg/PH-BXO/image/beta"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com/aircrafts/reg/{reg}/image/beta"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

codeType

optional_parameters.name: dateLocal
optional_parameters.description: The moment of time which solar data is request for (local time, format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm). Default - current time.

api_list.name: Airport runways
api_list.description: Gets information about runways at specified airport.

required_parameters.name: code
codeType
required_parameters.description: Type of code to search airport by (`iata` or `icao`)

api_list.name: Search airports by IP address geolocation
api_list.description:
**What are the airports closest to the customer, based on their IP address?**
** What are the airports closest to the location determined (geo-located) by a IP address?**

Gets the list of airports found within the specified radius around the location approximated (geo-located) from the specified IP address.

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: Maximum number of airports to be returned (max. 250)

required_parameters.name: radiusKm
required_parameters.description: Radius of search around specified location in kilometers (max. 1000 km)

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: A valid public IP v4 address

optional_parameters.name: withFlightInfoOnly
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, will only return airports which have flight data (scheduled or live) available. Default = false.

api_list.name: [DEPRECATED] Search airports by location (path-style)
api_list.description: Use `Search airports by location` endpoint instead.

required_parameters.name: radiusKm
required_parameters.description: Radius of search around specified location in kilometers (maximum 1000 km)

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: Maximum number of airports to be returned

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude location coordinate in decimal format (between -90 and 90)

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude location coordinate in decimal format (between -180 and 180)

optional_parameters.name: withFlightInfoOnly
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, will only return airports which have flight data (scheduled or live) available. Default = false.

api_list.name: Search airports by free text
api_list.description: Gets the list of airports with ICAO or IATA code matching the search term case-insensitively and airports with airport or city name containing the search term case-insensitively.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Search query (min. 3 non whitespace characters length)

optional_parameters.name: withSearchByCode
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, will attempt to interpret short words within the search query as IATA or ICAO code and prioritize exact matches by these codes (they will appear higher than others). Otherwise, the search by code will be completely excluded (only the name of an airport or its city will be searched). Default = true.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of airports to be returned (max. 250, defaut = 10)

optional_parameters.name: withFlightInfoOnly
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, will only return airports which have flight data (scheduled or live) available. Default = false.

api_list.name: Search airports by location
api_list.description: Gets the list of airports found within specified radius around specified location.

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: Maximum number of airports to be returned (max. 250)

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude location coordinate in decimal format (between -90 and 90)

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude location coordinate in decimal format (between -180 and 180)

required_parameters.name: radiusKm
required_parameters.description: Radius of search around specified location in kilometers (max. 1000 km)

optional_parameters.name: withFlightInfoOnly
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, will only return airports which have flight data (scheduled or live) available. Default = false.

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com/subscriptions/webhook/{subscriptionid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
